mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mem (mem_seq, mem_email, mem_name, mem_pw , mem_cert, mem_pwexpiry, mem_delcheck , mem_image, mem_position, mem_dept, mem_company) VALUES ((SELECT nextval('mem_seq') AS mem_seq FROM dual), #{memEmail}, #{memName}, #{memPw} , 0, (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)), 0 , null, null, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_mem WHERE mem_email = #{memEmail} and mem_delcheck = 0
